startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: URLs of Sahibinden.com real estate category pages. Example: https://www.sahibinden.com/satilik-daire/istanbul

maxItems.title: Max Items
maxItems.description: Maximum number of listings to scrape. Leave empty to scrape all available listings.

includeDetails.title: Include Details
includeDetails.description: If true, it will open each listing's detail page to extract description, all properties, photos, and owner info. If false, it only extracts basic info from the list page.

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum number of pages to open concurrently. High values increase the risk of getting banned. Recommended: 3-5.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings. Sahibinden.com requires RESIDENTIAL proxies.
proxyConfiguration.sectionDescription: RESIDENTIAL proxy is mandatory due to Sahibinden.com's Cloudflare protection. TR countryCode is recommended.

baseRowApiToken.title: BaseRow API Token
baseRowApiToken.description: Optional: BaseRow API token to save data directly to a BaseRow table.
baseRowApiToken.sectionDescription: Fill these fields if you want to push data directly to BaseRow.

sessionCookies.title: Session Cookies (JSON)
sessionCookies.description: Paste your active Session Cookies JSON (exported from your browser using EditThisCookie or similar) to bypass the mandatory Sahibinden.com login screen.
sessionCookies.sectionDescription: Provide your personal account cookies to bypass the Sahibinden login route (sahibinden.com/giris).
